versions.release_notes:
+ Transaction History gets a new look. Also, you can now easily filter and search your payments.
+ Pay your insurance premium for ICICI Prudential Life and Tata AIA Life.
+ Updated 'Scan & Pay' to allow seamless payments at any store that displays Chillr QR code.

**Drum rolls** Announcing the arrival of UPI on Chillr! ^_^
+ Adding support for a lot more banks with UPI (including SBI, ICICI, Axis, Kotak, Yes Bank etc.)
+ Connect and manage all your bank accounts at one place.
+ Now pay at any store through Chillr which accepts payments via UPI.
+ Recharges and bill payments feature for UPI users will be available very soon.
+ And a few bug fixes. Can there be any release note without this timeless classic!?

**Drum rolls** Announcing the arrival of UPI on Chillr! ^_^
+ Adding support for a lot more banks with UPI (including SBI, ICICI, Axis, Kotak, Yes Bank etc.)
+ Connect and manage all your bank accounts at one place.
+ Now pay at any store through Chillr which accepts payments via UPI.
+ Recharges and bill payments feature for UPI users will be available very soon.
+ And a few bug fixes. Can there be any release note without this timeless classic!?

+ Transaction History gets a new look. Also, you can now easily filter and search your payments.
+ Pay your insurance premium for ICICI Prudential Life and Tata AIA Life.
+ Updated 'Scan & Pay' to allow seamless payments at any store that displays Chillr QR code.

+ We are super excited to announce this! Now you can connect your multiple bank accounts, all at once.
+ Completely refreshed user registration.
+ Merchants can now onboard with Acc. No. and IFSC and start accepting payments.
+ Introducing DTH subscription plans
+ Smashed some bugs and improved stability.

+ FIXED: Users facing transaction failures will be able to make successful transactions post re-verification.
+ We have improved the mobile number verification process for enhanced security and convenience. Added alternate mode of verification through calls. Existing users need to re-verify their mobile no. post the update.

Chillr V2.0 makes your payment experience more smooth and fun.
- A brand new home screen that brings your most used features just one tap away.
- Timeline: Payments go social for the first time in India. Timeline lets friends share fun aspects of payment with each other
- Easy way to hide and see account balance
- You can now request money from a Chillr user using QR code
- Saraswat Bank users can now enjoy Chillr's trademark lightning fast transactions.
- Bug fixes and security improvements

- Bug fixes and security improvements

Unveiling the much awaited Chillr V2.0 to make your payment experience more smooth and fun.
- A brand new home screen that brings your most used features just one tap away.
- Timeline: Payments go social for the first time in India. Timeline lets friends share fun aspects of payment with each other.

What’s New?
*Now Andhra Bank customer can use Chillr to send money
*PAY is now SEND. So from now on don’t PAY your friends, just SEND
*Special offers for Mumbai & Pune. More cities coming soon.
*Easier 4-character alpha code payment method for stores.
*Payment confirmation page redesigned. Now see reasons for txn failure
*Now Friends > Chillr, Others > Non-Chillr and @tags > Tags
*Mobile no mandatory for Non-Chillr beneficiaries. So that we can notify them of the txn
*Fixed some annoying bugs
We have made some performance improvements to make your experience better!

1. Rejoice! Federal bank users can now enjoy Chillr's trademark lightning fast transactions.
2. HDFC users can now request for new MPIN by clicking on "Don't know my MPIN" in Change MPIN screen. And you don't even have to leave the app!!

* Andhra bank customers can now enjoy lightning fast recharges.
* We came across some bugs while testing, rest assured, we've smashed them!

Whats New?
*Bharat Bank & Punjab & Maharashtra Co-operative Bank is live on Chillr.

*Annoying bugs & crashes are fixed.

What’s New?
*Sending money to Non-Chillr users had a bug. We’ve fixed the bug.

*Missing Invite code bug has been fixed.

* Now you can browse offers and plans for Mobile, DTH & Datacard recharges.
* Retry button added on the MMID page to make it easier to get the MMID from the bank.
* We have changed the Chillr logo so that you can find it faster.
* We have added description to the tags.
* Smashed some minor bugs so that they don’t bother you anymore.

** We have fixed some major crashes which had hampered your usage experience.
** Fixed the payment confirmation status for Catholic Syrian Bank customer.
** Now get push notifications when our customer support executive promptly replies to your queries.

* We’ve made it easier for you by Introducing “@tags”; send money to professionals, institutions, non-profits etc just by knowing their @tags.
* Now avail discounts on merchant payments.
* UI tweaks were required for a better experience.
* Some minor more bugs were resolved.

*Forgot MPIN? link implemented on the MPIN page.
*Minor bugs fixed.

* We’ve made it easier for you by Introducing “@tags”; send money to professionals, institutions, non-profits etc just by knowing their @tags.

* Good News! Catholic Syrian Bank is added to Chillr. Now send money in seconds!
* We have added ‘Settings’ tab in the menu.
* Now get your transaction summary with the improved Transaction History page.
* We tweaked the app UI a bit to make it more user friendly.
* Those bugs fixes & performance improvements were needed so that you don’t have a bad experience.

store_info.title: Banking, Recharge & Bill Pay
store_info.description:
Chillr is the one stop solution for all your payment & mobile banking needs. A multi-bank payment service which works with 34 Banks (including HDFC Bank, Axis Bank, ICICI Bank, State Bank of India (SBI) etc.) Customers of these banks can use Chillr for instant money transfers, super fast recharges & simple utility bill payments.
Access your money digitally without having to store it in a third party money/ app. Chillr is a multi-bank app that gives you the power to transfer funds, send and receive money, request payments and recharge your mobile, data card or DTH instantly!

☆ Key Features

✓ Safe money transfers
All transactions made on Chillr are secured & protected by an MPIN.
All transaction & banking data is secured by end-to-end HTTPS encryption.

✓ Split Your Bills
Split bills on Chillr using the simple Request money feature.

✓ Utility Bill Payments and Recharges
Instant mobile, data card recharges for Airtel; Vodafone; Idea and other service providers & super fast utility bill payments for Electricity or Gas directly from your bank account.
Leave lengthy usernames, passwords, card details and OTP verifications for recharges and payments behind.

✓ Transaction Statements
Receive monthly transaction summaries & statements that help track & plan finances and expenses.

✓ Store Payments
Make simple payments at online & offline stores.
Scan the QR code for instant payment authentication.

✓ Unified Payment Interface (UPI) and Immediate Payment Service (IMPS) at the heart of Chillr
Built over IMPS and UPI platform, allows to offer you 24x7 payments with the greatest security measures to keep your money safe at all times.


How to use Chillr for instant money transfers, recharge, or any other mobile banking needs:

Download the app and complete the registration process for your specific bank. Please contact your bank for more details.

Which Banks can I connect on Chillr?
We have support for 34 banks. You may connect with:
● IMPS enabled: HDFC Bank, Andhra Bank, Bank of Baroda (BOB), Bank of India, Bharat Bank, CSB, Greater Bank, Federal Bank, PMC Bank, Saraswat Bank
● UPI enabled: Allahabad Bank, Axis Bank, Bank of Maharashtra, Canara Bank, Central Bank of India, DCB Bank, HSBC Bank, ICICI Bank, IDBI Bank, IDFC Bank, Karnataka Bank, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Oriental Bank of Commerce, Punjab National Bank (PNB), Ratnakar Bank (RBL), State Bank of India (SBI), Standard Chartered Bank (SCB), TJSB Sahakari Bank, UCO Bank, United Bank of India, Union Bank of India, Vijaya Bank, YES Bank

What are the charges for using Chillr?
Chill provides free money transfer services to all customers.
However, your bank may levy standard IMPS charges for sending money to OTHER bank accounts.

> HDFC Bank to other banks – if payment greater than ₹1000, ₹5 + Taxes, else FREE
> Andhra Bank to other banks – ₹5 + Taxes
> All other banks – FREE

SUPPORT
If you have any issues or suggestions please reach out to us via the following channels:
Live In-App Chat Support
Email - support@chillr.in

Connect with us.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mychillr
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mychillr
YouTube: https://youtube.com/+ChillrIndia
